Vulnerabilities.Title: Requests proxy credential exposure
Vulnerabilities.Description: The Requests package before 2.20.0 sends an HTTP Authorization header to an http URI upon receiving a same-hostname https-to-http redirect.

Vulnerabilities.Title: urllib3 certificate validation bypass
Vulnerabilities.Description: The urllib3 library before 1.24.2 does not properly validate certificates.

Vulnerabilities.Title: PyYAML arbitrary code execution
Vulnerabilities.Description: A vulnerability was discovered in the PyYAML library, where it is susceptible to arbitrary code execution when it processes untrusted YAML files.

Vulnerabilities.Title: Flask denial of service
Vulnerabilities.Description: The Pallets Project flask version Before 0.12.3 contains a CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in flask that can result in Large memory usage via crafted encoded JSON data.
